index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND HUMAN SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Housing and Human Services, increasing appropriations in the 1993 Budget for the Housing and Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund from Community Development Block Grant program revenues to be received from the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development, increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1993 Budget of the Department of Housing and Human Services to meet administrative oversight needs, increasing the Community Systems Support service area and creating certain positions.
committee: Housing, Health, Human Services and Education
